description: A altSwPrimaryPowerSuppylFailure trap signifies that the
primary power supply failed.

event.Summary: Primary power supply failure

redundant power supply failed.

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-TRAP-MIB::altSwRedunPowerSuppylFailure

description: A altSwDefGwUp trap signifies that the default
gateway is alive.

event.Summary: Default gateway $v1 is alive

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-TRAP-MIB::altSwDefGwUp ALTEON-PRIVATE-MIBS::ipCurCfgGwIndex i 1 ALTEON-PRIVATE-MIBS::ipCurCfgGwAddr a 192.0.2.1 RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE

description: The gateway number for which the information
is related.
variables.name: ALTEON-PRIVATE-MIBS::ipCurCfgGwIndex

description: The IP address of the default gateway.
variables.name: ALTEON-PRIVATE-MIBS::ipCurCfgGwAddr

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g.
`telephone closet, 3rd floor').
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: The textual identification of the contact person
for this managed node, together with information
on how to contact this person.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysContact

description: A altSwDefGwDown trap signifies that the default
gateway is down.
